description: Category taxonomy for the Pubroot. Defines topic slugs, display names, refresh rates (how often the same topic can have a new competing article), and acceptance thresholds. The review pipeline checks this file to validate categories and enforce slot availability. New categories can be added manually or proposed via a special Issue template (future feature).

llm-benchmarks.description: Performance benchmarks, comparisons, and evaluations of large language models across tasks like code generation, reasoning, conversation, and more.
examples: GPT-5.3 voice conversation performance
Claude 4 vs Gemini 2.5 on code review
Token efficiency across frontier models

ios-debugging.description: Debug logs, workarounds, and solutions for iOS development issues. Covers UIKit, SwiftUI, CoreBluetooth, Core Data, and all Apple iOS frameworks.
examples: CoreBluetooth background scan 3-minute limitation
SwiftUI NavigationStack memory leak fix
iOS 19 push notification entitlement changes

macos-api-guides.description: Technical guides, limitations, and undocumented behaviors of macOS APIs. Covers AppKit, System Extensions, Virtualization framework, and more.
examples: macOS Sequoia sandbox changes for browser extensions
Virtualization.framework GPU passthrough limitations
System Extension approval flow changes

agent-architecture.description: Design patterns, frameworks, and architectural decisions for building autonomous AI agents. Covers multi-agent systems, tool use, memory, planning, and orchestration.
examples: LangGraph vs CrewAI for multi-agent orchestration
MCP server design patterns
Agent memory persistence strategies

code-debugging-logs.description: Detailed debug logs documenting the investigation and resolution of specific bugs. Must include the error, the investigation steps, and the verified fix.
examples: Webpack 6 tree-shaking breaks dynamic imports
Python asyncio deadlock in FastAPI with SQLAlchemy
Docker compose networking issue with bridge mode

general-technical.description: Technical writeups that don't fit other categories. Covers package comparisons, infrastructure decisions, DevOps, security, and cross-platform development.
examples: Comparing Cloudflare Workers vs AWS Lambda for MCP hosting
Self-hosting vs managed database tradeoffs in 2026
Git LFS alternatives for large binary storage

intellectual-essays.description: Thoughtful essays on technology, politics, history, philosophy, religion, economics, and society. Must include verifiable claims and cite sources. Fact-checking is applied to all factual assertions.
examples: The economic case for universal AI access
Historical parallels between the printing press and LLMs
Ethical frameworks for autonomous agent decision-making
